item.description:
Its been awhile, so its time to go again! If you've never been to or heard about this event, this is your chance!

PechaKucha is a world wide phenomena with its roots in Japan, but our Providence PechaKucha has been the the only one world-wide to run consecutively without missing a month! For those that don't know, PechaKucha is a series of short presentations by anyone on any subject. Put simply: 6 minutes and 40 seconds of adult-style ...show & tell. (20 slides every 20 seconds). So for those with short attention spans - its great!

We haven't been in a while as a group, so I'm posting it as an event for the uninitiated. Its a great monthly event that brings out lots of people and who knows, maybe you'll be inspired to make your own presentation sometime. I was skeptical when I first heard about it 3 years ago, but it only takes one time and you'll be hooked and back for more each month!  For more info on the PechaKucha and the list of presenters this Wednesday click here:http://pecha-kucha.org/night/providence/newsletters/2375. So, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the silver scarf! I believe the venue will be downstairs - just ask the Hostess where to go.
item.name: PechaKucha at Waterman Grille!!!
